price: But I will send them a gift, then see with what response the envoys will return[8].”
arabic: وَإِنِّي مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡهِم بِهَدِيَّةٖ فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
footnotes: [8] She wanted to see whether Solomon was a true prophet or only a king who would be satisfied with a tribute.
